hanzi-su-wiki:
雑

Значения

Суматоха, мешанина; смешение; быть смешанным (спутанным); смешивать

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Много, т.е. не менее девяти 九 птиц 隹 на дереве 木. Птичий гам.

Варианты

雜, 杂, 襍
purpleculture_pinyin:
zá
Japanese variant of 杂
Японский вариант разного
rtega_mnemonic:
雑雑RSmixed, blended, mix, mingle
  • differing types birds 隹 in many trees 杂: they mix amongst each other
heisig_constituent: miscellaneous, nine, baseball, tree, wood, turkey
koohiiStory1: Newscast: "Among today´s miscellaneous stories, we have a report on a baseball team that was chased up a tree by a turkey. Stay tuned for this and more!".
koohiiStory2: On the left we have baseball and wood, which obviously means a baseball bat. Instead of balls, there are miscellaneous other objects you may hit with it. While beating people may be one favorite use, in this case we see it used for making turkey mash.
jp_example_words:
雑(ざつ): rough, crude
雑貨(ざっか): miscellaneous goods, general goods, sundries
雑談(ざつだん): chatting, idle talk
雑木(ざつぼく): various kinds of small trees, assorted trees
混雑(こんざつ): confusion, congestion
雑音(ざつおん): noise (jarring, grating)
雑巾(ぞうきん): dust cloth
複雑(ふくざつ): complicated
雑誌(ざっし): journal, magazine
jp_readingExamples: 雑談 (ざつだん), 雑音 (ざつおん), 混雑 (こんざつ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You count nine of them in the tree, each turkey holding something random or miscellaneous. There are nine turkeys in the tree and they’re all holding random, miscellaneous things. How odd.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at the turkeys in the tree. There are nine of them and they are all gobbling up a storm. Hear them gobble as you imagine what random, miscellaneous things they are holding.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As if things couldn’t get any more random, Zazu (ざつ) from the Lion King flies into the tree and starts asking the nine turkeys miscellaneous trivia. Zazu always did have a thirst for knowledge, but this is kind of strange.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look at Zazu asking the turkeys random questions about miscellaneous trivia. You’ve seen the Lion King, right? Zazu should be pretty easy to visualize here.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little birds (隹) in the nine (九) trees (木) are miscellaneous

雑字的基本解释

雑
zá
古同“杂”。

雑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zá］
［《廣韻》徂合切，入合，從。］
亦作“襍1”。“杂1”的繁体字。“籴2”的被通假字。亦作“雑1”。
(1)组合；配合。
(2)混杂；参杂。
(3)驳杂；不精纯。
(4)紊乱；使紊乱。
(5)多；繁多。
(6)装饰。
(7)兼及。
(8)共同，一起。
(9)一种诗体。参见“雜詩”。
(10)古代杂剧、传奇中生、旦、净、丑以外的一种行当，一般扮演各种临时上场、无关重要的人物。
(11)通“集”。集合；聚集。
(12)通“匝”。圆周。

雑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1367第07
【字彙】俗雜字。

雑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
雑字的起名意思

暂无。

雑
Basic explanation of words
雑
zá
The ancient same "miscellaneous".
雑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zá］
["Guangyun" is cut, enter, and follow. ]
Also known as "Xing 1". "Miscellaneous 1" in traditional characters. The false word for "籴2" was passed. Also known as "雑1".
(1) Combination; cooperation.
(2) Mixed; mixed.
(3) Miscellaneous; not pure.
(4) Disorder; make disorder.
(5) Many; many.
(6) Decoration.
(7) Concurrently.
(8) Together, together.
(9) A poetic style. See "Miscellaneous Poems".
(10) A profession other than ancient Zaju, Legend Zhongsheng, Dan, Jing, and Chou, generally playing various temporary and irrelevant characters.
(11) Through "collection". Gather; gather.
(12) Through the "turn". circumference.
雑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【隹字部】　雑; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1367 to 07
[Vocabulary] Vulgar miscellaneous words.

Name meaning

zá
яп. вм. 杂
Radicals: 九, 木, 隹  (nine, tree, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
You count nine of them in the tree, each turkey holding something random or miscellaneous. There are nine turkeys in the tree and they’re all holding random, miscellaneous things. How odd.
Look at the turkeys in the tree. There are nine of them and they are all gobbling up a storm. Hear them gobble as you imagine what random, miscellaneous things they are holding.
Reading Mnemonic
As if things couldn’t get any more random, Zazu (ざつ) from the Lion King flies into the tree and starts asking the nine turkeys miscellaneous trivia. Zazu always did have a thirst for knowledge, but this is kind of strange.
Look at Zazu asking the turkeys random questions about miscellaneous trivia. You’ve seen the Lion King, right? Zazu should be pretty easy to visualize here.
